hang.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to put something in a position so that the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground
hang.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Philip hung his coat on a hook behind the door.
She hung the sheets on the washing line.
hang.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to be in a position where the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground
hang.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: An old-fashioned gas lamp hung from the ceiling.
Her long hair hung loose about her shoulders.
The shirt hung down almost to his ankles.
hang.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to fix a picture, photograph etc to a wall
hang.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: I wanted to hang the picture in the hall.
hang.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: if a picture, photograph etc is hanging somewhere, it is fixed to a wall
hang.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: There was a family photograph hanging on the wall.
hang.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: if the walls of a room are hung with pictures or decorations, the pictures etc are on the walls
hang.translation[0].definitions[4].examp: The entrance hall was hung with rich tapestries.
hang.translation[0].definitions[5].defin: to kill someone by dropping them with a rope around their neck, or to die in this way, especially as a punishment for a serious crime
hang.translation[0].definitions[5].examp: If he is found guilty, he will almost certainly hang.
Corey hanged himself in his prison cell.
hang.translation[0].definitions[6].defin: to fasten attractive paper to a wall in order to decorate a room
hang.translation[0].definitions[6].examp: We spent the afternoon hanging wallpaper.
hang.translation[0].definitions[7].defin: to fasten a door in position
hang.translation[0].definitions[7].examp: Hanging a door is quite a tricky job.
hang.translation[0].definitions[8].defin: if something such as smoke hangs in the air, it stays in the air for a long time
hang.translation[0].definitions[8].examp: The smoke from the bonfires hung in the air.
A thick mist hung over the town.
hang.translation[0].definitions[9].defin: to spend time somewhere, relaxing and enjoying yourself
hang.translation[0].definitions[9].examp: We were just hanging with the dudes at Mikeâ€™s house.
